snippet.title: Unmourned — Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Unmourned is a first person psychological horror game where you play as Jason, a man who moves into a new house only to be haunted by escalating paranormal activities. As the disturbances grow more intense, Jason discovers that the house's previous owners mysteriously vanished. Driven by terror and desperation, Jason must uncover the truth behind the family’s disappearance and find a way to break the curse that now haunts him. Can he solve the mystery before it's too late?

This gameplay trailer showcases real in-game footage, giving you a glimpse of the haunting atmosphere, eerie encounters, and the unsettling mystery that awaits. Will you survive the horrors lurking in the shadows?

👁 Wishlist Now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3528970?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=codebrosdescription&utm_campaign=social_media

📢 Join our Discord server: https://discord.com/invite/97QDQJ4Ne7  
🔔 Subscribe for Updates: https://unmournedthegame.com/index.php/subscribe-to-newsletter-page  
Unmourned Website: https://www.unmournedthegame.com  

Follow Us for More Horror:  
🕹 Facebook: https://facebook.com/profile.php?id=61572236455637
🐦 Twitter: https://x.com/UnmournedGame/
📷 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/unmournedgame/
🔗https://www.tiktok.com/@unmournedgame
